author: The Telegraph
title: Learn from a ski guru in Champoluc, Italy: March 5 to 12 2016
text: Learn from the master Champoluc, Italy, March 5 to 12 2016 £1,158 Led by Warren Smith, Warren Smith Ski Academy Telegraph Ski and Snowboard ski skills editor Warren Smith – founder of the Warren Smith Ski Academy – is renowned for his ability to transform skiers' technique. This week-long Academy course, led by Warren himself, is being held on the slopes of Monterosa Ski – three unspoilt valleys that are home to the linked resorts of Champoluc, Gressoney and Alagna, which have excellent on- and off-piste terrain. Warren will be joined by a team of instructors from the Academy but will spend an equal amount of time with each group. On the course you will develop skills and confidence to ski all types of terrain including moguls, steeps and powder. Our tour operator partner Inghams is offering comfortable, well-located accommodation, at the foot of the slopes near the village centre. Telegraph readers are getting the chance to learn from Warren himself The unbeatable price, from £729 for the holiday and £429 for the course, includes: The course • Five day’s coaching • Skiing from 10am to 3pm daily with a break for lunch • Maximum group size of eight people • Video analysis The holiday package • Return flights from London Gatwick to Turin • Transfers to and from resort • Six nights chalet board in Chalet Hotel Champoluc (breakfast, afternoon tea and dinner including wine) • Complimentary tea and coffee available all day Exclusive Telegraph extras • Course led by Warren Smith • Meet and ski with members of The Telegraph Ski and Snowboard team • Welcome drinks reception • End of week party with lots of great prizes to be won Chalet-board accommodation is supplied by Inghams in the Chalet Hotel de Champoluc for £729; course fee £429. To book the holiday package, call Inghams on 01483 791111 or email champoluc@inghams.co.uk. To book the course, email Warren Smith Ski Academy bookings@warrensmith-skiacademy.com Telegraphtravel Follow @telegraphtravel
